content:
hi all,
In my project , there is an information called 'Measured at' which can be used to specify whether the clinical parameters were measured at home or at the clinic. We use a template with keywords to record clinical parameter values, and 'Measured at' is another keyword in that same template. So what is the best FHIR resource type to use here to create a profile for Measured at value. Please note for the clinical parameters we created 'Observation' type profiles.
There would be more than one way to do it. Encounter.location might be one of them.
